channel.title: Hybris Team || VPS/Website Up || Multiple Coders || Looking For Last Developer
channel.description:
We are a team that is currently consisting of 5 dedicated people with years of experience in our own each specified area. Looking to further develop into a full team, started out recently with a skilled & passionate staff team. Aiming to reach as high as we can.
We're going under the name Hybris, can be referenced to as "Hybris-RSPS". And [B]currently[/B] we're looking for a [U]Java developer[/U] that can complete our development team. In a specified note, we need a content developer. Someone that can code mini-games, quests, fullscreen/client side work. As well as other general tasks around the server.
What we require from you is..
- To be 18 years old or older. /exceptions can be discussed, depending. - Good experience in the Java language. We're looking for a developer/coder, not an editor. - Good knowledge in English, being able to communicate. - A good attitude.
Interested? Requirements fits? Awesome, go ahead and add my skype and I will look forward to a further discussion.
Skype: wow-zech. If for some reason you can't find me, send me a PM.

item.title: Hybris Team || VPS/Website Up || Multiple Coders || Looking For Last Developer
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Empty Mr Empty
item.description:
@Mr_Empty wrote:

[quote=“my-swagger, post:3, topic:554182”][quote author=loliateyourcat link=topic=673106.msg4501264#msg4501264 date=1450945823]
I have said what I needed to say here…

rune-server.ee

[317] Requesting a content developer

Rune-Server


[/quote]
This.

These guys will waste a lot of time. Spent ages trying to tell me loliateyourcat is bsing due to personal beef when I told them many times that I don’t care. I even said I believe them but the guy does not shut up lmao.[/quote]

Seems like you exaggerated a bit there, we’ve only mentioned loliateyourcat once just to explain & we didn’t “waste” your time as we only chatted less then a day & you left

Read full topic
